com.cloudgarden.speech
Interface CGSpeakableListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener, SpeakableListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
CGSpeakableAdapter, Mouth
public interface CGSpeakableListener
extends SpeakableListener

Adds methods to the SpeakableListener interface to allow lip-sync events to be passed from a synthesizer.
